General.Name: Endur ASA
General.Description: Endúr ASA operates as a supplier of construction and maintenance projects, services, and solutions for marine infrastructure businesses in Norway and the Norwegian Continental Shelf, and internationally. The company operates through Marine infrastructure, Aquaculture Solutions, and Other segments. It constructs and maintains facilities for land-based aquaculture, quays, harbors, dams, bridges, and other specialized concrete and steel projects. The company also offers maritime and ship maintenance services. In addition, it is involved in the production of concrete barges for the aquaculture industry. The company was formerly known as Bergen Group ASA and changed its name to Endúr ASA in February 2019. Endúr ASA was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Lysaker, Norway.

4.Name: Ingegjerd  Eidsvik
4.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Artec Aqua
